thread.title: Green Path Academy: your pathway to leading universities.

title: Green Path Academy: your pathway to leading universities.
text: Green Path Academy: your pathway to leading universities. The length of schooling for Canadian high school is four years, during which period every student has to gain 30 credits altogether. Canada, 10 October 2015 -- Why choose GREEN PATH ACADEMY/ The edges of GREEN PATH ACADEMYAs a private high school in North York, GREEN PATH ACADEMY enjoys beautiful environment. And as the first private school while being entitled with the same qualification of public schools, GREEN PATH ACADEMY provides free high-quality education for Canadians. It also creates excellent language learning environment for all students in class, where students from different countries, rather than all from China, study and experience the native Canadian culture and customs all together. Unique class in GREEN PATH ACADEMY Famous University Express Class.All students within the class can be ensured to enter an ideal university. Otherwise, all the tuition will be given back to students. Why entering ideal universities can be ensured The teaching staff in GREEN PATH ACADEMY adopts intensive teaching, and make studying plan for every student according to their own aptitude. Besides, GREEN PATH ACADEMY provides students with modern nanny service to ensure that they can attain the university entrance qualification in the shortest time. GREEN PATH ACADEMY is authorized as the language test place for ETS and Michigan University Language Tests. And its Language Express Class can help every student to pass the language test in the shortest time. Accommodation and life Since June, 2015, GREEN PATH ACADEMY began to invest a lot of money on building dormitories for students. Every student can own a room of his or her own, or choose to live in two-bedroom and three-bedroom apartment. All the apartments are facilitated with kitchen (including refrigerators, toaster oven, workbench, dishwasher and microwave oven), bed with the size of 1.5*2 m, internet serves and free water and electricity. There is also 24-hour security service and students dining hall. High school course of Canada The length of schooling for Canadian high school is four years, during which period every student has to gain 30 credits altogether. Since mathematics and physics are generally the same, high schools in Ontario recognize the credits that have been achieved in Chinese high school. For second-year high school students, altogether 20 to 22 credits can be accepted. That is the reason why more and more students choose to study abroad since the second year of high school # # # About GREEN PATH ACADEMY: GREEN PATH ACADEMY is a private educational institution established under the approval of Ministry of Education, Ontario,Canada. Graduates from GREEN PATH ACADEMY will be provided with the Ontario Secondary School Diploma (OSSD for short). The administrative campus of GREEN PATH ACADEMY lies in 5734 yonge St, Toronto M2M 4E7. Tel 416-733-4114, website http://www.gpaedu.ca Media Contacts:
